title: Expenditure and tax multipliers and AD

content.question: Suppose the marginal propensity to consume is 0.8. If government spending increases by $15 million and personal income taxes increase by $20 million, what will be the maximum possible change in aggregate demand in the short run?

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
